content: Xdev currently has a blog of its own, and its purpose overlaps the purpose of the ESDS blog. Would it be beneficial to consolidate blogs (i.e., have just one ESDS blog and allow everyone to post to it)?

Anyone interested take a look at my AGU poster abstract on ESDS educational efforts: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1_n0_-cV5l7U1fjV5BRSAWxOZP9t1hOKdq1VnFVN04GA/edit?usp=sharing Let me know if you want to be a co-author!
I'd be willing to help out with this!!
